main event: UFO sighting in Palos Verdes, California, observed for about 15 minutes with blue-red-green blinking lights.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 15 minutes, blinking lights were observed on the object, it did not return on that date, the sighting will be investigated further, the distance estimated from the observer was 15 to 20 miles.
sighted object: an unidentified object with blue-red-green lights
witness description: The witness is not explicitly mentioned, but there were observations made.
